00042 
00043 #ifndef __OPENCV_GPU_TYPE_TRAITS_HPP__
00044 #define __OPENCV_GPU_TYPE_TRAITS_HPP__
00045 
00046 #include "detail/type_traits_detail.hpp"
00047 
00048 namespace cv { namespace gpu { namespace device
00049 {
00050     template <typename T> struct IsSimpleParameter
00051     {
00052         enum {value = type_traits_detail::IsIntegral<T>::value || type_traits_detail::IsFloat<T>::value ||
00053             type_traits_detail::PointerTraits<typename type_traits_detail::ReferenceTraits<T>::type>::value};
00054     };
00055 
00056     template <typename T> struct TypeTraits
00057     {
00058         typedef typename type_traits_detail::UnConst<T>::type                                                NonConstType;
00059         typedef typename type_traits_detail::UnVolatile<T>::type                                             NonVolatileType;
00060         typedef typename type_traits_detail::UnVolatile<typename type_traits_detail::UnConst<T>::type>::type UnqualifiedType;
00061         typedef typename type_traits_detail::PointerTraits<UnqualifiedType>::type                            PointeeType;
00062         typedef typename type_traits_detail::ReferenceTraits<T>::type                                        ReferredType;
00063 
00064         enum { isConst          = type_traits_detail::UnConst<T>::value };
00065         enum { isVolatile       = type_traits_detail::UnVolatile<T>::value };
00066 
00067         enum { isReference      = type_traits_detail::ReferenceTraits<UnqualifiedType>::value };
00068         enum { isPointer        = type_traits_detail::PointerTraits<typename type_traits_detail::ReferenceTraits<UnqualifiedType>::type>::value };
00069 
00070         enum { isUnsignedInt    = type_traits_detail::IsUnsignedIntegral<UnqualifiedType>::value };
00071         enum { isSignedInt      = type_traits_detail::IsSignedIntergral<UnqualifiedType>::value };
00072         enum { isIntegral       = type_traits_detail::IsIntegral<UnqualifiedType>::value };
00073         enum { isFloat          = type_traits_detail::IsFloat<UnqualifiedType>::value };
00074         enum { isArith          = isIntegral || isFloat };
00075         enum { isVec            = type_traits_detail::IsVec<UnqualifiedType>::value };
00076 
00077         typedef typename type_traits_detail::Select<IsSimpleParameter<UnqualifiedType>::value,
00078             T, typename type_traits_detail::AddParameterType<T>::type>::type ParameterType;
00079     };
00080 }}}
00081 
00082 #endif // __OPENCV_GPU_TYPE_TRAITS_HPP__
